<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// IntersectDominators - This is the dataflow lattice &quot;meet&quot; operation for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// finding dominators.  Given two basic blocks, it walks up the dominator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// tree until it finds a common dominator of both.  It uses the postorder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// number of the blocks to determine how to do that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#ad25fe079e293e33582cbb5f3bf494bf5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BBInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#ad25fe079e293e33582cbb5f3bf494bf5">IntersectDominators</a>(BBInfo &#42;Blk1, BBInfo &#42;Blk2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Blk1 != Blk2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Blk1-&gt;BlkNum &lt; Blk2-&gt;BlkNum) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Blk1 = Blk1-&gt;IDom;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Blk1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Blk2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Blk2-&gt;BlkNum &lt; Blk1-&gt;BlkNum) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Blk2 = Blk2-&gt;IDom;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Blk2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Blk1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Blk1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FindDominators - Calculate the dominator tree for the subset of the CFG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// corresponding to the basic blocks on the BlockList.  This uses the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// algorithm from: &quot;A Simple, Fast Dominance Algorithm&quot; by Cooper, Harvey</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and Kennedy, published in Software--Practice and Experience, 2001,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 4:1-10.  Because the CFG subset does not include any edges leading into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks that define the value, the results are not the usual dominator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// tree.  The CFG subset has a single pseudo-entry node with edges to a set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of root nodes for blocks that define the value.  The dominators for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// subset CFG are not the standard dominators but they are adequate for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// placing PHIs within the subset CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a0ab1c1435c29eea38d7a8dd64f064b84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a0ab1c1435c29eea38d7a8dd64f064b84">FindDominators</a>(BlockListTy &#42;BlockList, BBInfo &#42;PseudoEntry) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over the list in reverse order, i.e., forward on CFG edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#af6a3df9bf4da2b9af52a9ad973e6f30c">BlockListTy::reverse&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = BlockList-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a23aab542398091e1fcfd46b6006d64ac">rbegin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = BlockList-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad696953257cf1c4e5bd12d02146e7287">rend</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BBInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BBInfo &#42;NewIDom = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate through the block&#39;s predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> p = 0; p != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;NumPreds; ++p) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BBInfo &#42;Pred = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;Preds&#91;p&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Treat an unreachable predecessor as a definition with &#39;poison&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred-&gt;BlkNum == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Pred-&gt;AvailableVal = Traits::GetPoisonVal(Pred-&gt;BB, Updater);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (&#42;AvailableVals)&#91;Pred-&gt;BB&#93; = Pred-&gt;AvailableVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Pred-&gt;DefBB = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Pred-&gt;BlkNum = PseudoEntry-&gt;BlkNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">            PseudoEntry-&gt;BlkNum++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewIDom)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">            NewIDom = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">            NewIDom = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#ad25fe079e293e33582cbb5f3bf494bf5">IntersectDominators</a>(NewIDom, Pred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the IDom value has changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewIDom &amp;&amp; NewIDom != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;IDom) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;IDom = NewIDom;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// IsDefInDomFrontier - Search up the dominator tree from Pred to IDom for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// any blocks containing definitions of the value.  If one is found, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the successor of Pred is in the dominance frontier for the definition,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and this function returns true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a42e6b449c6b8fe1fa8d10f2f300f7e9b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a42e6b449c6b8fe1fa8d10f2f300f7e9b">IsDefInDomFrontier</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBInfo &#42;Pred, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBInfo &#42;IDom) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; Pred != IDom; Pred = Pred-&gt;IDom) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred-&gt;DefBB == Pred)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FindPHIPlacement - PHIs are needed in the iterated dominance frontiers</span></CodeLine>
